amendment.description: Amendments en bloc comprised of the following amendments printed in Part B of House Report 117-6 as en bloc No. 2: Nos. 7, 8, 9, 11, 15, 16, 17, 25, 26, 27, and 29.
amendment.purpose: Amendments en bloc No. 2 comprised of amendments numbered 7, 8, 9, 11, 15, 16, 17, 25, 26, 27, and 29, printed in Part B of House Report 117-6.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Neguse amendments (A004) Failed by the Yeas and Nays: 197 - 226 (Roll no. 43).

action.text: The previous question was ordered on the amendment (A004) pursuant to the rule.
